dc_description_s: The Platts Electric Holding Company Service Territories geospatial data layer contains regions representing the geographic extent of retail service for all utility holding companies in North America. Included in the attribute information are revenues, rates, number of customers, and total megawatt-hours delivered for residential, commercial, industrial, and wholesale electricity sales by holding company.
dc_title_s: North America (Electric Holding Company Service Territories, Dec. 2008)
